title: World Wide Web Proposed
description: Tim Berners-Lee proposed the World Wide Web, revolutionizing the way we access and share information.

title: Facebook Launched
description: Mark Zuckerberg and co-founders launched Facebook from Harvard University.

title: First Moon Landing
description: Apollo 11 successfully landed humans on the Moon and returned them safely to Earth.

title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
description: The Berlin Wall fell, marking the symbolic end of the Cold War.

title: COVID-19 Pandemic Declared
description: The WHO declared COVID-19 a global pandemic, affecting lives worldwide.

title: First iPhone Released
description: Apple released the first iPhone, changing the smartphone industry forever.

title: Curiosity Rover Lands on Mars
description: NASA's Curiosity rover successfully landed on Mars to explore the planet's surface.

title: Windows 95 Released
description: Microsoft released Windows 95, introducing the Start menu and taskbar.
